name: They Are My Presents: Hunting
description:
They Are My Presents: Hunting is an Arcade game, your objective is to get as many Presents as possible while trying to don't run out of time!.

Features:

  • Custom Game: Change the options for the game like Time, Present limit, Event Speed.
  • Characters: This first version includes 3 characters, one of them has unique movement.
  • Tree: tree
  • Controller Support: The game is made for Keyboard or Controller Only, No Mouse!
